question: What was the main purpose of the Cuttack Conference?
option2: The merger of the Gajarat (Princely) states
option4: Restoration of Odia Language replacing Hindi
answer: The merger of the Gajarat (Princely) states
explanation: Cuttack Conference was held on 14<sup>th</sup> December 1947. The main purpose of the Cuttack Conference was the merger of the Gajarat (Princely) states.
